verses.verse: בֵּלְשַׁאצַּ֣ר <S%H1113><s%> Belshazzar מַלְכָּ֗א <S%H4430><s%> the king עֲבַד֙ <S%H5648><s%> made לְחֶ֣ם <S%H3900><s%> feast רַ֔ב <S%H7229><s%> a great לְרַבְרְבָנ֖וֹהִי <S%H7261><s%> of his lords אֲלַ֑ף <S%H506><s%> to a thousand וְלָקֳבֵ֥ל <S%H6903><s%> before אַלְפָּ֖א <S%H506><s%> the thousand חַמְרָ֥א <S%H2562><s%> wine שָׁתֵֽה׃ <S%H8355><s%> and drank

בֵּלְשַׁאצַּ֞ר <S%H1113><s%> Belshazzar אֲמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H560><s%> commanded בִּטְעֵ֣ם <S%H2939><s%> make to eat חַמְרָ֗א <S%H2562><s%> the wine לְהַיְתָיָה֙ <S%H858><s%> to bring לְמָאנֵי֙ <S%H3984><s%> vessels דַּהֲבָ֣א <S%H1722><s%> the golden וְכַסְפָּ֔א <S%H3702><s%> and silver דִּ֤י <S%H1768><s%> which הַנְפֵּק֙ <S%H5312><s%> had taken נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֣ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar אֲב֔וּהִי <S%H2><s%> which his father מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> out of הֵיכְלָ֖א <S%H1965><s%> the temple דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> which בִירוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <S%H3390><s%> which [was] in Jerusalem וְיִשְׁתּ֣וֹן <S%H8355><s%> might drink בְּה֗וֹן מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> that the king וְרַבְרְבָנ֔וֹהִי <S%H7261><s%> and his princes שֵׁגְלָתֵ֖הּ <S%H7695><s%> his wives וּלְחֵנָתֵֽהּ׃ <S%H3904><s%> and his concubines

בֵּאדַ֗יִן <S%H116><s%> Then הַיְתִיו֙ <S%H858><s%> they brought מָאנֵ֣י <S%H3984><s%> vessels דַהֲבָ֔א <S%H1722><s%> the golden דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> which הַנְפִּ֗קוּ <S%H5312><s%> that were taken מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> out of הֵֽיכְלָ֛א <S%H1965><s%> the temple דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> which בֵ֥ית <S%H1005><s%> of the house אֱלָהָ֖א <S%H426><s%> of God דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> which בִירֽוּשְׁלֶ֑ם <S%H3390><s%> which [was] at Jerusalem וְאִשְׁתִּ֣יו <S%H8355><s%> drank בְּה֗וֹן מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> and the king וְרַבְרְבָנ֔וֹהִי <S%H7261><s%> and his princes שֵׁגְלָתֵ֖הּ <S%H7695><s%> his wives וּלְחֵנָתֵֽהּ׃ <S%H3904><s%> and his concubines

אִשְׁתִּ֖יו <S%H8355><s%> They drank חַמְרָ֑א <S%H2562><s%> wine וְ֠שַׁבַּחוּ <S%H7624><s%> and praised לֵֽאלָהֵ֞י <S%H426><s%> the gods דַּהֲבָ֧א <S%H1722><s%> of gold וְכַסְפָּ֛א <S%H3702><s%> and of silver נְחָשָׁ֥א <S%H5174><s%> of brass פַרְזְלָ֖א <S%H6523><s%> of iron אָעָ֥א <S%H636><s%> of wood וְאַבְנָֽא׃ <S%H69><s%> and of stone

בַּהּ־ שַׁעֲתָ֗ה <S%H8160><s%> In the same hour [נְפַקוּ כ] (נְפַ֙קָה֙ <S%H5312><s%> go ק) אֶצְבְּעָן֙ <S%H677><s%> fingers דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch יַד־ <S%H3028><s%> hand אֱנָ֔שׁ <S%H606><s%> of a man's וְכָֽתְבָן֙ <S%H3790><s%> and wrote לָקֳבֵ֣ל <S%H6903><s%> over against נֶבְרַשְׁתָּ֔א <S%H5043><s%> the candlestick עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> upon גִּירָ֕א <S%H1528><s%> the plaister דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch כְתַ֥ל <S%H3797><s%> of the wall הֵיכְלָ֖א <S%H1965><s%> palace דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> of the king's וּמַלְכָּ֣א <S%H4430><s%> and the king חָזֵ֔ה <S%H2370><s%> saw פַּ֥ס <S%H6447><s%> the part יְדָ֖ה <S%H3028><s%> of the hand דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> did כָתְבָֽה׃ <S%H3790><s%> that wrote

אֱדַ֤יִן <S%H116><s%> Then מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> the king's זִיוֹ֣הִי <S%H2122><s%> countenance שְׁנ֔וֹהִי <S%H8133><s%> was changed וְרַעיֹנֹ֖הִי <S%H7476><s%> and his thoughts יְבַהֲלוּנֵּ֑הּ <S%H927><s%> troubled וְקִטְרֵ֤י <S%H7001><s%> him so that the joints חַרְצֵהּ֙ <S%H2783><s%> of his loins מִשְׁתָּרַ֔יִן <S%H8271><s%> were loosed וְאַ֨רְכֻבָּתֵ֔הּ <S%H755><s%> and his knees דָּ֥א <S%H1668><s%> one לְדָ֖א <S%H1668><s%> against another נָֽקְשָֽׁן׃ <S%H5368><s%> smote

קָרֵ֤א <S%H7123><s%> cried מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> The king בְּחַ֔יִל <S%H2429><s%> aloud לְהֶֽעָלָה֙ <S%H5954><s%> to bring לְאָ֣שְׁפַיָּ֔א <S%H826><s%> in the astrologers [כַּשְׂדָּיֵא כ] (כַּשְׂדָּאֵ֖י <S%H3779><s%> Chaldean ק) וְגָזְרַיָּ֑א <S%H1505><s%> and the soothsayers עָנֵ֨ה <S%H6032><s%> spake מַלְכָּ֜א <S%H4430><s%> [And] the king וְאָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H560><s%> and said לְחַכִּימֵ֣י <S%H2445><s%> to the wise בָבֶ֗ל <S%H895><s%> [men] of Babylon דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> who כָל־ <S%H3606><s%> Any אֱ֠נָשׁ <S%H606><s%> man דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> who יִקְרֵ֞ה <S%H7123><s%> shall read כְּתָבָ֣ה <S%H3792><s%> writing דְנָ֗ה <S%H1836><s%> this וּפִשְׁרֵהּ֙ <S%H6591><s%> me the interpretation יְחַוִּנַּ֔נִי <S%H2324><s%> and shew אַרְגְּוָנָ֣א <S%H711><s%> with scarlet יִלְבַּ֗שׁ <S%H3848><s%> thereof shall be clothed [וְהַמֹּונְכָא כ] (וְהַֽמְנִיכָ֤א <S%H2002><s%> chain ק) דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> who דַהֲבָא֙ <S%H1722><s%> of gold עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> about צַוְּארֵ֔הּ <S%H6676><s%> his neck וְתַלְתִּ֥י <S%H8523><s%> and shall be the third בְמַלְכוּתָ֖א <S%H4437><s%> in the kingdom יִשְׁלַֽט׃ <S%H7981><s%> ruler ס

אֱדַ֙יִן֙ <S%H116><s%> Then [עָלֲלִין כ] (עָֽלִּ֔ין <S%H5954><s%> bring in ק) כֹּ֖ל <S%H3606><s%> in all חַכִּימֵ֣י <S%H2445><s%> wise מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> the king's וְלָֽא־ <S%H3809><s%> not כָהֲלִ֤ין <S%H3546><s%> [men] but they could כְּתָבָא֙ <S%H3792><s%> the writing לְמִקְרֵ֔א <S%H7123><s%> read [וּפִשְׁרָא כ] (וּפִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <S%H6591><s%> interpretation ק) לְהוֹדָעָ֥ה <S%H3046><s%> nor make known לְמַלְכָּֽא׃ <S%H4430><s%> to the king

אֱ֠דַיִן <S%H116><s%> Then מַלְכָּ֤א <S%H4430><s%> was king בֵלְשַׁאצַּר֙ <S%H1113><s%> Belshazzar שַׂגִּ֣יא <S%H7690><s%> greatly מִתְבָּהַ֔ל <S%H927><s%> troubled וְזִיוֹ֖הִי <S%H2122><s%> and his countenance שָׁנַ֣יִן <S%H8133><s%> was changed עֲל֑וֹהִי <S%H5922><s%> in him וְרַבְרְבָנ֖וֹהִי <S%H7261><s%> and his lords מִֽשְׁתַּבְּשִֽׁין׃ <S%H7672><s%> were astonied

מַלְכְּתָ֕א <S%H4433><s%> [Now] the queen לָקֳבֵ֨ל <S%H6903><s%> by reason מִלֵּ֤י <S%H4406><s%> of the words מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> of the king וְרַבְרְבָנ֔וֹהִי <S%H7261><s%> and his lords לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1005><s%> house מִשְׁתְּיָ֖א <S%H4961><s%> into the banquet [עַלֲלַת כ] (עַלַּ֑ת <S%H5954><s%> bring in ק) עֲנָ֨ת <S%H6032><s%> spake מַלְכְּתָ֜א <S%H4433><s%> [and] the queen וַאֲמֶ֗רֶת <S%H560><s%> and said מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> O king לְעָלְמִ֣ין <S%H5957><s%> for ever חֱיִ֔י <S%H2418><s%> live אַֽל־ <S%H409><s%> let not יְבַהֲלוּךְ֙ <S%H927><s%> trouble רַעְיוֹנָ֔ךְ <S%H7476><s%> thy thoughts וְזִיוָ֖יךְ <S%H2122><s%> thee nor let thy countenance אַל־ <S%H409><s%> not יִשְׁתַּנּֽוֹ׃ <S%H8133><s%> be changed

אִיתַ֨י <S%H383><s%> There is גְּבַ֜ר <S%H1400><s%> a man בְּמַלְכוּתָ֗ךְ <S%H4437><s%> in thy kingdom דִּ֠י <S%H1768><s%> whom ר֣וּחַ <S%H7308><s%> in whom [is] the spirit אֱלָהִ֣ין <S%H426><s%> gods קַדִּישִׁין֮ <S%H6922><s%> of the holy בֵּהּ֒ וּבְיוֹמֵ֣י <S%H3118><s%> and in the days אֲב֗וּךְ <S%H2><s%> of thy father נַהִיר֧וּ <S%H5094><s%> light וְשָׂכְלְתָנ֛וּ <S%H7924><s%> and understanding וְחָכְמָ֥ה <S%H2452><s%> and wisdom כְּחָכְמַת־ <S%H2452><s%> like the wisdom אֱלָהִ֖ין <S%H426><s%> of the gods הִשְׁתְּכַ֣חַת <S%H7912><s%> was found בֵּ֑הּ וּמַלְכָּ֤א <S%H4430><s%> in him whom the king נְבֻֽכַדְנֶצַּר֙ <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar אֲב֔וּךְ <S%H2><s%> thy father רַ֧ב <S%H7229><s%> master חַרְטֻמִּ֣ין <S%H2749><s%> of the magicians אָֽשְׁפִ֗ין <S%H826><s%> astrologers כַּשְׂדָּאִין֙ <S%H3779><s%> Chaldeans גָּזְרִ֔ין <S%H1505><s%> [and] soothsayers הֲקִימֵ֖הּ <S%H6966><s%> made אֲב֥וּךְ <S%H2><s%> [I say] thy father מַלְכָּֽא׃ <S%H4430><s%> the king

כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all קֳבֵ֡ל <S%H6903><s%> according to דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> whom ר֣וּחַ ׀ <S%H7308><s%> spirit יַתִּירָ֡ה <S%H3493><s%> an excellent וּמַנְדַּ֡ע <S%H4486><s%> and knowledge וְשָׂכְלְתָנ֡וּ <S%H7924><s%> and understanding מְפַשַּׁ֣ר <S%H6590><s%> interpreting חֶלְמִין֩ <S%H2493><s%> of dreams וַֽאַֽחֲוָיַ֨ת <S%H263><s%> and shewing אֲחִידָ֜ן <S%H280><s%> of hard sentences וּמְשָׁרֵ֣א <S%H8271><s%> and dissolving קִטְרִ֗ין <S%H7001><s%> of doubts הִשְׁתְּכַ֤חַת <S%H7912><s%> were found בֵּהּ֙ בְּדָ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1841><s%> in the same Daniel דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> whom מַלְכָּ֥א <S%H4430><s%> whom the king שָׂם־ <S%H7761><s%> command שְׁמֵ֖הּ <S%H8036><s%> named בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּ֑ר <S%H1096><s%> Belteshazzar כְּעַ֛ן <S%H3705><s%> now דָּנִיֵּ֥אל <S%H1841><s%> let Daniel יִתְקְרֵ֖י <S%H7123><s%> be called וּפִשְׁרָ֥ה <S%H6591><s%> the interpretation יְהַֽחֲוֵֽה׃ <S%H2324><s%> and he will shew פ

בֵּאדַ֙יִן֙ <S%H116><s%> Then דָּֽנִיֵּ֔אל <S%H1841><s%> was Daniel הֻעַ֖ל <S%H5954><s%> brought in קֳדָ֣ם <S%H6925><s%> before מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> the king עָנֵ֨ה <S%H6032><s%> spake מַלְכָּ֜א <S%H4430><s%> [And] the king וְאָמַ֣ר <S%H560><s%> and said לְדָנִיֵּ֗אל <S%H1841><s%> unto Daniel [אַנְתָּה כ] (אַנְתְּ־ <S%H607><s%> thou ה֤וּא <S%H607><s%> [Art] thou ק) דָנִיֵּאל֙ <S%H1841><s%> that Daniel דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> who מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> which [art] of בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1123><s%> the children גָלוּתָא֙ <S%H1547><s%> of the captivity דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> whom יְה֔וּד <S%H3061><s%> of Judah דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> whom הַיְתִ֛י <S%H858><s%> brought מַלְכָּ֥א <S%H4430><s%> whom the king אַ֖בִי <S%H2><s%> my father מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> out of יְהֽוּד׃ <S%H3061><s%> Judah

וְשִׁמְעֵ֣ת <S%H8086><s%> I have even heard [עֲלַיִךְ כ] (עֲלָ֔ךְ <S%H5921><s%> and ק) דִּ֛י <S%H1768><s%> that ר֥וּחַ <S%H7308><s%> of thee that the spirit אֱלָהִ֖ין <S%H426><s%> of the gods בָּ֑ךְ וְנַהִיר֧וּ <S%H5094><s%> and [that] light וְשָׂכְלְתָנ֛וּ <S%H7924><s%> and understanding וְחָכְמָ֥ה <S%H2452><s%> wisdom יַתִּירָ֖ה <S%H3493><s%> and excellent הִשְׁתְּכַ֥חַת <S%H7912><s%> is found בָּֽךְ׃

וּכְעַ֞ן <S%H3705><s%> And now הֻעַ֣לּוּ <S%H5954><s%> have been brought קָֽדָמַ֗י <S%H6925><s%> in before חַכִּֽימַיָּא֙ <S%H2445><s%> the wise אָֽשְׁפַיָּ֔א <S%H826><s%> [men] the astrologers דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch כְתָבָ֤ה <S%H3792><s%> writing דְנָה֙ <S%H1836><s%> this יִקְר֔וֹן <S%H7123><s%> me that they should read וּפִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <S%H6591><s%> unto me the interpretation לְהוֹדָעֻתַ֑נִי <S%H3046><s%> and make known וְלָֽא־ <S%H3809><s%> not כָהֲלִ֥ין <S%H3546><s%> thereof but they could פְּשַֽׁר־ <S%H6591><s%> the interpretation מִלְּתָ֖א <S%H4406><s%> of the thing לְהַחֲוָיָֽה׃ <S%H2324><s%> shew

וַאֲנָה֙ <S%H576><s%> And I שִׁמְעֵ֣ת <S%H8086><s%> have heard [עֲלַיִךְ כ] (עֲלָ֔ךְ <S%H5921><s%> and ק) דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch [תוּכַל כ] (תִיכּ֥וּל <S%H3202><s%> be able ק) פִּשְׁרִ֛ין <S%H6591><s%> interpretations לְמִפְשַׁ֖ר <S%H6590><s%> make וְקִטְרִ֣ין <S%H7001><s%> doubts לְמִשְׁרֵ֑א <S%H8271><s%> and dissolve כְּעַ֡ן <S%H3705><s%> now הֵן֩ <S%H2006><s%> if [תּוּכַל כ] (תִּכ֨וּל <S%H3202><s%> be able ק) כְּתָבָ֜א <S%H3792><s%> the writing לְמִקְרֵ֗א <S%H7123><s%> read וּפִשְׁרֵהּ֙ <S%H6591><s%> to me the interpretation לְהוֹדָ֣עֻתַ֔נִי <S%H3046><s%> and make known אַרְגְּוָנָ֣א <S%H711><s%> with scarlet תִלְבַּ֗שׁ <S%H3848><s%> thereof thou shalt be clothed [וְהַמֹּונְכָא כ] (וְהַֽמְנִיכָ֤א <S%H2002><s%> chain ק) דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch דַהֲבָא֙ <S%H1722><s%> of gold עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> of thee צַוְּארָ֔ךְ <S%H6676><s%> thy neck וְתַלְתָּ֥א <S%H8531><s%> and shalt be the third בְמַלְכוּתָ֖א <S%H4437><s%> in the kingdom תִּשְׁלַֽט׃ <S%H7981><s%> ruler פ

בֵּאדַ֜יִן <S%H116><s%> Then עָנֵ֣ה <S%H6032><s%> answered דָנִיֵּ֗אל <S%H1841><s%> Daniel וְאָמַר֙ <S%H560><s%> and said קֳדָ֣ם <S%H6925><s%> before מַלְכָּ֔א <S%H4430><s%> the king מַתְּנָתָךְ֙ <S%H4978><s%> Let thy gifts לָ֣ךְ לֶֽהֶוְיָ֔ן <S%H1934><s%> be וּנְבָ֥זְבְּיָתָ֖ךְ <S%H5023><s%> thy rewards לְאָחֳרָ֣ן <S%H321><s%> to another הַ֑ב <S%H3052><s%> to thyself and give בְּרַ֗ם <S%H1297><s%> yet כְּתָבָא֙ <S%H3792><s%> the writing אֶקְרֵ֣א <S%H7123><s%> I will read לְמַלְכָּ֔א <S%H4430><s%> unto the king וּפִשְׁרָ֖א <S%H6591><s%> to him the interpretation אֲהוֹדְעִנֵּֽהּ׃ <S%H3046><s%> and make known

[אַנְתָּה כ] (אַ֖נְתְּ <S%H607><s%> as for thee ק) מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> king אֱלָהָא֙ <S%H426><s%> God [עִלָּיָא כ] (עִלָּאָ֔ה <S%H5943><s%> high ק) מַלְכוּתָ֤א <S%H4437><s%> a kingdom וּרְבוּתָא֙ <S%H7238><s%> and majesty וִיקָרָ֣א <S%H3367><s%> and glory וְהַדְרָ֔ה <S%H1923><s%> and honour יְהַ֖ב <S%H3052><s%> gave לִנְבֻכַדְנֶצַּ֥ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar אֲבֽוּךְ׃ <S%H2><s%> thy father

וּמִן־ <S%H4481><s%> And for רְבוּתָא֙ <S%H7238><s%> the majesty דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> which יְהַב־ <S%H3052><s%> that he gave לֵ֔הּ כֹּ֣ל <S%H3606><s%> him all עַֽמְמַיָּ֗א <S%H5972><s%> people אֻמַיָּא֙ <S%H524><s%> nations וְלִשָּׁ֣נַיָּ֔א <S%H3961><s%> and languages הֲו֛וֹ <S%H1934><s%> become [זָאֲעִין כ] (זָיְעִ֥ין <S%H2112><s%> tremble ק) וְדָחֲלִ֖ין <S%H1763><s%> and feared מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> before קֳדָמ֑וֹהִי <S%H6925><s%> him דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> whomever הֲוָ֨ה <S%H1934><s%> he צָבֵ֜א <S%H6634><s%> wished הֲוָ֣א <S%H1934><s%> he קָטֵ֗ל <S%H6992><s%> killed וְדִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> and whomever הֲוָ֤ה <S%H1934><s%> he צָבֵא֙ <S%H6634><s%> wished הֲוָ֣ה <S%H1934><s%> he מַחֵ֔א <S%H2418><s%> spared וְדִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> and whomever הֲוָ֤ה <S%H1934><s%> he צָבֵא֙ <S%H6634><s%> wished הֲוָ֣ה <S%H1934><s%> he מָרִ֔ים <S%H7313><s%> elevated וְדִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> and whomever הֲוָ֥ה <S%H1934><s%> he צָבֵ֖א <S%H6634><s%> wished הֲוָ֥ה <S%H1934><s%> he מַשְׁפִּֽיל׃ <S%H8214><s%> humbled

וּכְדִי֙ <S%H1768><s%> when רִ֣ם <S%H7313><s%> was lifted up לִבְבֵ֔הּ <S%H3825><s%> But when his heart וְרוּחֵ֖הּ <S%H7308><s%> and his mind תִּֽקְפַ֣ת <S%H8631><s%> hardened לַהֲזָדָ֑ה <S%H2103><s%> in pride הָנְחַת֙ <S%H5182><s%> he was deposed מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from כָּרְסֵ֣א <S%H3764><s%> throne מַלְכוּתֵ֔הּ <S%H4437><s%> his kingly וִֽיקָרָ֖ה <S%H3367><s%> his glory הֶעְדִּ֥יוּ <S%H5709><s%> and they took מִנֵּֽהּ׃ <S%H4481><s%> from him

וּמִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from בְּנֵי֩ <S%H1123><s%> the sons אֲנָשָׁ֨א <S%H606><s%> of men טְרִ֜יד <S%H2957><s%> And he was driven וְלִבְבֵ֣הּ ׀ <S%H3825><s%> and his heart עִם־ <S%H5974><s%> like חֵיוְתָ֣א <S%H2423><s%> the beasts [שְׁוִי כ] (שַׁוִּ֗יְו <S%H7739><s%> make like ק) וְעִם־ <S%H5974><s%> with עֲרָֽדַיָּא֙ <S%H6167><s%> [was] with the wild asses מְדוֹרֵ֔הּ <S%H4070><s%> and his dwelling עִשְׂבָּ֤א <S%H6211><s%> him with grass כְתוֹרִין֙ <S%H8450><s%> like oxen יְטַ֣עֲמוּנֵּ֔הּ <S%H2939><s%> they fed וּמִטַּ֥ל <S%H2920><s%> with the dew שְׁמַיָּ֖א <S%H8065><s%> of heaven גִּשְׁמֵ֣הּ <S%H1655><s%> and his body יִצְטַבַּ֑ע <S%H6647><s%> was wet עַ֣ד <S%H5705><s%> till דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch יְדַ֗ע <S%H3046><s%> he knew דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch שַׁלִּ֞יט <S%H7990><s%> ruled אֱלָהָ֤א <S%H426><s%> God [עִלָּיָא כ] (עִלָּאָה֙ <S%H5943><s%> high ק) בְּמַלְכ֣וּת <S%H4437><s%> in the kingdom אֲנָשָׁ֔א <S%H606><s%> of men וּלְמַן־ <S%H4479><s%> it whomsoever דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch יִצְבֵּ֖ה <S%H6634><s%> he will יְהָקֵ֥ים <S%H6966><s%> and [that] he appointeth [עֲלַיֵהּ כ] (עֲלַֽהּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and ק)

[וְאַנְתָּה כ] (וְאַ֤נְתְּ <S%H607><s%> as for thee ק) בְּרֵהּ֙ <S%H1247><s%> his son בֵּלְשַׁאצַּ֔ר <S%H1113><s%> O Belshazzar לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> hast not הַשְׁפֵּ֖לְתְּ <S%H8214><s%> humbled לִבְבָ֑ךְ <S%H3825><s%> thine heart כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all קֳבֵ֕ל <S%H6903><s%> though דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> even כָל־ <S%H3606><s%> all דְּנָ֖ה <S%H1836><s%> this יְדַֽעְתָּ׃ <S%H3046><s%> thou knewest

וְעַ֣ל <S%H5922><s%> thyself against מָרֵֽא־ <S%H4756><s%> the Lord שְׁמַיָּ֣א ׀ <S%H8065><s%> of heaven הִתְרוֹמַ֡מְתָּ <S%H7313><s%> But hast lifted up וּלְמָֽאנַיָּ֨א <S%H3984><s%> the vessels דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> which בַיְתֵ֜הּ <S%H1005><s%> of his house הַיְתִ֣יו <S%H858><s%> and they have brought [קָדָמַיִךְ כ] (קָֽדָמָ֗ךְ <S%H6925><s%> before ק) [וְאַנְתָּה כ] (וְאַ֨נְתְּ <S%H607><s%> as for thee ק) [וְרַבְרְבָנַיִךְ כ] (וְרַבְרְבָנָ֜ךְ <S%H7261><s%> lord ק) שֵֽׁגְלָתָ֣ךְ <S%H7695><s%> thy wives וּלְחֵנָתָךְ֮ <S%H3904><s%> and thy concubines חַמְרָא֮ <S%H2562><s%> wine שָׁתַ֣יִן <S%H8355><s%> have drunk בְּהוֹן֒ וְלֵֽאלָהֵ֣י <S%H426><s%> the gods כַסְפָּֽא־ <S%H3702><s%> of silver וְ֠דַהֲבָא <S%H1722><s%> and gold נְחָשָׁ֨א <S%H5174><s%> of brass פַרְזְלָ֜א <S%H6523><s%> iron אָעָ֣א <S%H636><s%> wood וְאַבְנָ֗א <S%H69><s%> and stone דִּ֠י <S%H1768><s%> whose לָֽא־ <S%H3809><s%> not חָזַ֧יִן <S%H2370><s%> which see וְלָא־ <S%H3809><s%> nor שָׁמְעִ֛ין <S%H8086><s%> hear וְלָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> nor יָדְעִ֖ין <S%H3046><s%> know שַׁבַּ֑חְתָּ <S%H7624><s%> in them and thou hast praised וְלֵֽאלָהָ֞א <S%H426><s%> and the God דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> which נִשְׁמְתָ֥ךְ <S%H5396><s%> thy breath בִּידֵ֛הּ <S%H3028><s%> in whose hand וְכָל־ <S%H3606><s%> [is] and whose [are] all אֹרְחָתָ֥ךְ <S%H735><s%> thy ways לֵ֖הּ לָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> hast thou not הַדַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H1922><s%> glorified

בֵּאדַ֙יִן֙ <S%H116><s%> Then מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from קֳדָמ֔וֹהִי <S%H6925><s%> him שְׁלִ֖יַחַ <S%H7972><s%> sent פַּסָּ֣א <S%H6447><s%> was the part דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch יְדָ֑א <S%H3028><s%> of the hand וּכְתָבָ֥א <S%H3792><s%> writing דְנָ֖ה <S%H1836><s%> and this רְשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7560><s%> was written

וּדְנָ֥ה <S%H1836><s%> And this כְתָבָ֖א <S%H3792><s%> [is] the writing דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> that רְשִׁ֑ים <S%H7560><s%> that was written מְנֵ֥א <S%H4484><s%> MENE מְנֵ֖א <S%H4484><s%> MENE תְּקֵ֥ל <S%H8625><s%> TEKEL וּפַרְסִֽין׃ <S%H6537><s%> UPHARSIN

דְּנָ֖ה <S%H1836><s%> This פְּשַֽׁר־ <S%H6591><s%> [is] the interpretation מִלְּתָ֑א <S%H4406><s%> of the thing מְנֵ֕א <S%H4484><s%> MENE מְנָֽה־ <S%H4483><s%> hath numbered אֱלָהָ֥א <S%H426><s%> God מַלְכוּתָ֖ךְ <S%H4437><s%> thy kingdom וְהַשְׁלְמַֽהּ׃ <S%H8000><s%> and finished
תְּקֵ֑ל <S%H8625><s%> TEKEL תְּקִ֥ילְתָּה <S%H8625><s%> Thou art weighed בְמֹֽאזַנְיָ֖א <S%H3977><s%> in the balances וְהִשְׁתְּכַ֥חַתְּ <S%H7912><s%> and art found חַסִּֽיר׃ <S%H2627><s%> wanting

פְּרֵ֑ס <S%H6537><s%> PERES פְּרִיסַת֙ <S%H6537><s%> is divided מַלְכוּתָ֔ךְ <S%H4437><s%> Thy kingdom וִיהִיבַ֖ת <S%H3052><s%> and given לְמָדַ֥י <S%H4076><s%> to the Medes וּפָרָֽס׃ <S%H6540><s%> and Persians

בֵּאדַ֣יִן ׀ <S%H116><s%> Then אֲמַ֣ר <S%H560><s%> commanded בֵּלְשַׁאצַּ֗ר <S%H1113><s%> Belshazzar וְהַלְבִּ֤ישׁוּ <S%H3848><s%> and they clothed לְדָֽנִיֵּאל֙ <S%H1841><s%> Daniel אַרְגְּוָנָ֔א <S%H711><s%> with scarlet [וְהַמֹּונְכָא כ] (וְהַֽמְנִיכָ֥א <S%H2002><s%> chain ק) דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch דַהֲבָ֖א <S%H1722><s%> of gold עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> about צַוְּארֵ֑הּ <S%H6676><s%> his neck וְהַכְרִ֣זֽוּ <S%H3745><s%> and made a proclamation עֲל֔וֹהִי <S%H5922><s%> concerning דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> that לֶהֱוֵ֥א <S%H1934><s%> him that he should be שַׁלִּ֛יט <S%H7990><s%> ruler תַּלְתָּ֖א <S%H8531><s%> the third בְּמַלְכוּתָֽא׃ <S%H4437><s%> in the kingdom

בֵּ֚הּ בְּלֵ֣ילְיָ֔א <S%H3916><s%> In that night קְטִ֕יל <S%H6992><s%> slain בֵּלְאשַׁצַּ֖ר <S%H1113><s%> was Belshazzar מַלְכָּ֥א <S%H4430><s%> the king [כַשְׂדָּיָא כ] (כַשְׂדָּאָֽה׃ <S%H3779><s%> Chaldean ק) פ

וְדָרְיָ֙וֶשׁ֙ <S%H1868><s%> And Darius [מָדָיָא כ] (מָֽדָאָ֔ה <S%H4077><s%> Median ק) קַבֵּ֖ל <S%H6902><s%> took מַלְכוּתָ֑א <S%H4437><s%> the kingdom כְּבַ֥ר <S%H1247><s%> old שְׁנִ֖ין <S%H8140><s%> years שִׁתִּ֥ין <S%H8361><s%> [being] about threescore וְתַרְתֵּֽין׃ <S%H8648><s%> and two
